body.name: Laundry Detergent Sheets, 80 Sheets Lavender Scent Laundry Soap Sheets - Eco-Friendly Hypoallergenic Liquidless Washing Supplies for Dorm Travel Camping - 80 Loads

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: 80 Laundry Detergent Sheets: Affordable 80 sheets laundry sheets, each pre-cut and pre-measured, no more measuring cups and goodbye to tediously measured liquids.

Gentle Formula: This laundry sheets detergent is made of ultra-concentrated plant formula, free of dyes and artificial brighteners, low foaming and phosphate-free, with a fresh linen scent that effectively removes odors. They do not cause any unnecessary irritation and are safe for you and your clothes.

Eco-friendly: Biodegradable detergent sheets that are friendly to the environment. In addition, our packaging is recyclable with zero plastic, unlike plastic cans, which can take hundreds or thousands of years to decompose. Choose us, let us contribute to the protection of the earth together.

Space Saving: Detergent sheets are lighter, smaller, more convenient and easier to store than traditional large plastic jars of detergent, 1 plastic jug can hold several boxes of tablets in the same space, say goodbye to messy laundry room.

Easy to Use: No measuring required, laundry sheets dissolve quickly in both hot and cold water, just put the sheets and laundry in the washing machine. (80 sheets = 80 small loads, or 2 sheets for larger loads)

Easy to Carry: The travel laundry detergent sheets are as thin and light as paper, so if you travel a lot, you can take a little out and put it in your suitcase. They add little weight to your luggage and you don't have to worry about spilling liquid onto other clothes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 80 Laundry Detergent Sheets = 80 Small Loads = 40 Large Loads Laundry sheets are an alternative to the traditional plastic-packaged liquid laundry detergent and washing powder on the market. It is both green environment and practical. With laundry sheets, say goodbye to heavy jugs or caked-on powders. There is no drip, no mess, and zero waste. Laundry tablets are low foaming, ultra-concentrated, hypoallergenic and provide a powerful deep clean.Laundry sheets dissolve easily in hot or cold water and are suitable for both conventional and HE machines.Laundry sheets detergent are great for everyday laundry cleaning including cotton, linen, blends, and durable synthetics.Our laundry soap sheets are degradable and the boxes are made from recyclable materials with no plastic, reducing environmental pollution.Each laundry tab is pre-cut and measured, you don't need to measure the dose. 2 sheets are approximately equal to 1 cap of liquid detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to find a product that not only works well but doesn't take up a ton of space in my laundry room. The price allowed me to stock up. For regular loads I use one sheet and the clothes come out clean. I have a front loader and I tear the sheets in half and toss them directly into the washing machine. I will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cool, convenient, and tiny for traveling!
reviews.reviewText: This product was great for washing laundry in a sink when traveling. I basically stuck to the rule of one sink=one sheet, which worked great. I washed jeans that had been sweated through with two sheets. Everything came out clean. I didn't notice a smell, but they were fresh. It got out a few coffee stains as well. I have a few left but will hang on to them for similar travel situations, not wasting them in a regular washing machine. These little sheets allowed two people to take a 15-day trip with basically five days worth of clothes. I will buy these again when we run out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It Makes the Job a bit Easier. Weak Scent Though.
reviews.reviewText: First off, this is a great idea! It saves space and doesn't leaf a large plastice bottle in the environment. It also makes doing laundry a bit easier and smoother overall. No need to measure liquid or even carry the extra weight around. The only problem is the scent is very, very faint. I used 2 sheet in a full load and could hardly smell anything. They suggest 1 sheet per load but really it's probably closer to 3. (If you want to smell the lavender scent) I actually don't prefer strong scented laundry detergent but if I'm going with "lavender" scented detergent I do want to smell some of it on my clothes.I thought I'd try this over liquid detergent since the price was a bit less. But given that more than 1 sheet was needed per load I'm not really saving much at all. But I really don't miss carrying liquid detergent around so I'll continue to try out the sheets but maybe a different brand next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are so much better and easier than traditional washing soap or pods...and they don't contain harmful chemicals. And this brand is an excellent value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No Scent, Dissolves Quickly, Less Waste
reviews.reviewText: There is no fragrance which is a bummer, but they dissolve quickly and clothes do smell clean. Convenient small packaging. The shipping packaging was a bummer, lots of plastic tape around the shipping box. Wondering if Zimwin would consider switching to paper tape that is recyclable in the future?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Alternative to Liquid
reviews.reviewText: I have now used these laundry detergent sheets a few times. They seem to work great. No big heavy jugs, no spills and more cabinet space!Only caution is that the sheets are very very thin (see photo). Just be careful that you don't accidently toss 2 or 3 in washer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This does not work. Doesn't soap up in the washer, nothing! Didn't seem like my clorhes were clean. Very disappointed. I'm going back to GAIN!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with Purchase
reviews.reviewText: It does what it promises to do. Cleans clothes well, and smells nice. No residue left on clothes
